attrs.script:
#!/usr/bin/env bash
set -ex

# Assuming CentOS/RedHat 8.2
echo "__ Mysql Alter root MySQL account..."
# https://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/8.0/en/linux-installation-yum-repo.html

# sudo yum install -y "http://repo.mysql.com/mysql80-community-release-el8.rpm" &&
#   sudo yum module -y disable mysql &&
#   sudo yum install -y mysql-community-server

# database must be started for SQL configuration
sudo systemctl start mysqld
# database should start on OS boot
# sudo systemctl enable mysqld
# sudo systemctl status mysqld.service

echo "__ Connect to MySQL database with root"
mysql --user=root --password='@@{MYSQL_PASSWORD}@@' 
#<<- "EOF"

echo "__ Altering database root password..."

SET GLOBAL validate_password.policy=LOW;
ALTER user 'root'@'localhost' IDENTIFIED BY '@@{MYSQL_NEW_PASSWORD}@@';


EOF

#!/usr/bin/env bash

sudo yum -y update

#!/usr/bin/env bash
set -ex

echo "__ Install httpd and php..."
sudo yum install -y httpd
sudo yum install -y php php-gd php-mbstring php-pdo php-mysqlnd

echo "<IfModule mod_dir.c>
        DirectoryIndex index.php index.html
</IfModule>" | sudo tee /etc/httpd/conf.modules.d/dir.conf

echo "<?php
phpinfo();
?>" | sudo tee /var/www/html/index.php

sudo systemctl enable httpd

# temporarily disable SELinux to prevent httpd to MySQL authentication issues
# this is for testing only and should not be done in production environments
echo "__ Temporarily disable SELinux..."
sudo setenforce 0

#!/usr/bin/env bash
set -ex

sudo rm -rf /var/www/html/* || true
sudo yum erase -y httpd php || true

#!/usr/bin/env bash

sudo yum -y update

#!/usr/bin/env bash
set -ex

echo "__ HAProxy installation..."
sudo yum install -y haproxy &&
  sudo systemctl enable haproxy || true # idempotent
haproxy -v

echo "__ HAProxy configuration..."
# http://cbonte.github.io/haproxy-dconv/1.8/configuration.html#4
port=80

echo "global
  log 127.0.0.1 local0
  log 127.0.0.1 local1 notice
  maxconn 4096
  quiet
  user haproxy
  group haproxy
defaults
  log global
  mode http
  retries 3
  timeout client 50s
  timeout connect 5s
  timeout server 50s
  option dontlognull
  option httplog
  option redispatch
  balance  roundrobin
# Set up application listeners here.
listen stats
  bind *:8080
  mode http
  log global
  stats enable
  stats hide-version
  stats refresh 30s
  stats show-node
  stats uri /stats
#listen admin
#  bind 127.0.0.1:22002
#  mode http
#  stats uri /
frontend http
  bind *:${port}
  maxconn 2000
  default_backend servers-http
backend servers-http" | sudo tee /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg

sudo sed -i 's/server host-/#server host-/g' /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg

hosts=$(echo "@@{WebServer.address}@@" | sed 's/^,//' | sed 's/,$//' | tr "," "\n")
for host in $hosts; do
  echo  "  server host-${host} ${host}:${port} weight 1 maxconn 100 check" | sudo tee -a /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg
done

#!/usr/bin/env bash

sudo yum -y erase haproxy

#!/usr/bin/env bash

sudo yum -y update

#!/usr/bin/env bash

echo "Generic uninstall script, goodbye!"

#!/usr/bin/env bash
set -ex

echo "__ HAProxy installation..."
sudo yum install -y haproxy &&
  sudo systemctl enable haproxy || true # idempotent
haproxy -v

echo "__ HAProxy configuration..."

  stats show-node
  stats uri /stats
#listen admin
#  bind 127.0.0.1:22002
#  mode http
#  stats uri /
frontend http
  bind *:${port}
  maxconn 2000
  default_backend servers-http
backend servers-http" | sudo tee /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg

sudo sed -i 's/server host-/#server host-/g' /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg

hosts=$(echo "@@{WebServer.address}@@" | sed 's/^,//' | sed 's/,$//' | tr "," "\n")
for host in $hosts; do
  echo  "  server host-${host} ${host}:${port} weight 1 maxconn 100 check" | sudo tee -a /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg
done

#!/usr/bin/env bash
set -ex

echo "__ HAProxy installation..."
sudo yum install -y haproxy &&
  sudo systemctl enable haproxy || true # idempotent
haproxy -v

echo "__ HAProxy configuration..."
# http://cbonte.github.io/haproxy-dconv/1.8/configuration.html#4
port=80

echo "global
  log 127.0.0.1 local0
  log 127.0.0.1 local1 notice
  maxconn 4096
  quiet
  user haproxy
  group haproxy
defaults
  log global
  mode http
  retries 3
  timeout client 50s
  timeout connect 5s
  timeout server 50s
  option dontlognull
  option httplog
  option redispatch
  balance  roundrobin
# Set up application listeners here.
listen stats
  bind *:8080
  mode http
  log global
  stats enable
  stats hide-version
  stats refresh 30s
  stats show-node
  stats uri /stats
#listen admin
#  bind 127.0.0.1:22002
#  mode http
#  stats uri /
frontend http
  bind *:${port}
  maxconn 2000
  default_backend servers-http
backend servers-http" | sudo tee /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg

sudo sed -i 's/server host-/#server host-/g' /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg

hosts=$(echo "@@{WebServer.address}@@" | sed 's/^,//' | sed 's/,$//' | tr "," "\n")
for host in $hosts; do
  echo  "  server host-${host} ${host}:${port} weight 1 maxconn 100 check" | sudo tee -a /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg
done
